name: Tiny Melon Friend's Big Melon Adventure - v0.1 Alpha Demo
name_original: Tiny Melon Friend's Big Melon Adventure - v0.1 Alpha Demo
description:
"Get out of my garba- research pile, tiny melon friend!"

Take control of the little nuisance known as Tiny Melon Friend  and embark on a platforming adventure through alien worlds in Tiny Melon Friend's Big Melon Adventure, a funky fresh new game from @DrMelon and @leafcodes!

This is the first public demo of TMFBMA, "v0.1 Alpha"! We've been working on this game on and off in our spare time for quite a while now, and we're super proud to let you play this early, early peek into what may come in the future. The target audience for this is mostly our own friend groups, but if you liked it, please let us know over on the official TMFBMA twitter account!

As this is just a demo, we don't feel comfortable charging anything for this, but if you want to throw us a little spare change, you can check out this ko-fi link!

Demo features:

  • 4 levels of platforming action!
  • 8 tracks of catchy music, available on Bandcamp!
  • Secrets to uncover, beans to collect, and skins to unlock!
  • Colourful characters to chat to!
  • Rebindable and configurable controls - both on keyboard and controller!
  • Patented DoodleScribble™ graphics!
  • Modding support!

Install instructions:

Download the zip file and extract somewhere on your computer. Open the folder, and open "TMFBMA.exe" to play. 

Save files and option configurations are saved to "My Documents/tmfbma/".
